Your Opinion of MR4
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): MR4 Polls: Your Opinion of MR4
By Swezlon Uno on Tuesday, January 16, 2007 - 05:15 pm:

I personlly like MR4, but many on this site do not. I truly love the game, so I see little fault with it. (Please note that I have extremely low standards according to my brother). But many of you do. I would just like to know if you like or dislike the game, and what are the reasons why.

By Waddafxup 101 on Sunday, July 15, 2007 - 02:33 pm:

I LOVE MR4.It is my favorite of all MR games.

By Salokin on Thursday, August 9, 2007 - 12:34 pm:

It rocks MR4 is definataly the best of the Monster Ranchers. Seriously, if you played the others and liked them MR4 is the BEST!

By Anonymous on Wednesday, August 29, 2007 - 08:37 am:

In my opinion MR4 is deffinitely one of the best, but for my total favorite, I have to stick with MR2. That being said, I still totally love being able to raise multiple monsters at once and some of the monsters that were added into it.

By Salokin on Wednesday, August 29, 2007 - 01:36 pm:

Yeah. The reason I don't like the ones from 3 down is because you can only raise one monster.

By Love Me Do on Thursday, January 24, 2008 - 04:09 pm:

I have 3 & 4, but from what people on this site are saying, 2 sounds good as well. Problem is, I have a compact PS2 and PS1 m.c.'s don't fit in them. But out of 3 & 4, 4 is the best, no question in my mind!

By Capt. Brainpan on Friday, January 25, 2008 - 04:54 am:

I agree with Love Me Do's assessment. If I had to pick between 3 and 4, I'd grab 4 100 times out of 100. The fact that you can raise more than one at a time is the big selling factor to me--- there's no downtime between monsters! There's no "spend a year while I get my monster to C so I can really start playing" mode in it. You get going, and you're gone!

Also, 3 was too easy. I beat it on the first try. It took me more than a year to master 4. I basically cheated, too. I just raised a Zuum for max speed, and fought Raggy. He missed me all sixty seconds, so I won 100% to 95%. ;)
